titleStmt.title: Insignia prælustris Societatis Scoticanæ, ad Africam & Indias Mercaturam facientis, explicata.

notesStmt.note: Latin verse - "Jam via tuta patet vastus qua panditur Orbis,"; giving a laudatory explanation of the coat of arms of the Company of Scotland Trading to Africa and the Indies.
At head a woodcut of the coat of arms.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
